name: Fossil Finder
description:
Fossil Finder is an arcade game with RPG elements.

You are a young promising scientist who went to the excavations of ancient lands. Find all the artifacts of antiquity,
precious stones and remains of past civilizations! Beware of traps in uncharted territories, no one knows
what can sometimes be found underground.

Features:
- Nice graphics.
- Pumping system.
- Randomly generated locations.
